description: Nurse Hudson has been fantasizing about his boss Dr. Carmen Cruz. He dreams about being her next patient. He wants to serve her in every way. One day after a long day he falls asleep in the office. Wolf dreams about all the nasty things he wants done to him. He dreams about Dr. Carmen punishing him for being bad. He dreams about her mouth around his hard cock. He dreams about her sweet dick fucking his face and ass.
title: Dr. Carmen Cruz
